COMPANY BIO-DATA

General Information

PSOVIC OVERFLOWS INT'L (NIG.) LTD is duly registered and incorperated by Corperate Affairs Commission of the Federal Republic of Nigeria as a private limited liability Company under the Allied Matters Decree of 1990, The Company was registered on the 12th day of February, 1991.

PSOVIC OVERFLOWS INT'L (NIG.) LTD is a tall standing 100 indeginous Company and is managed by Nigerians, it is an Engineering, construction, maintanance, environmental service and procurement company, it has grown from a modest beginning to become a big player in the oil, gas petrochemical and construction sectors, and has come to be known as an innovative service company capable of delivering a quality service.

PSOVIC OVERFLOWS INT'L (NIG.) LTD works from the perspective of complete dedication and protection of industrial institution and facilities. The directors of the company a well-established reputation of achievingnthis in their projects.
The company is an engeneering, construction, procurement and dredging company with a braod experience in the oil, gas, petrochemical and the infrastructural development of the Nigeria economy. With a sound resource base at our disposal and with a high powered network of goal-driven,multi-skilled team and qualified professionals, combining competence, quality, know-how and technology, we have acquiredthe necessary technical capabibilty whichhas enabled us to undertake huge engineering, construction, maintenance, environmental services, fabrication and procurement works etc.

The Company PSOVIC OVERFLOWS INT'L (NIG.) LTD believes in quality service which encompasses the business principle objectives, which is to provide its client with quality service. PSOVIC OVERFLOWS INT'L (NIG.)LTD has over the years established and operated standard CASHES, Quality Assurance and Quality Control Policy (QA/QC) universal oriented safety policy and good communication and industrial relations.


BOARD OF DIRECTORS
The Board of PSOVIC OVERFLOWS INT'L (NIG.) LTD is made up of businessmen, professionals in Engineering, Marine and Mechanical, whose experience are basically in Energy, Oil, Gas, Construction, Engineering etc. They are a network of individuals with proven expertise and integrity. Their policy guideline has affected positively on the company's entire staff and Nigeria's economy as a whole.
MANAGEMENT
This company is powered by good driven management team, which consists of experience young, dynamic and intelligent minds and staff comprising of professionals in Engineering. Finance, Accounts, and Marketing etc. Our team is professionally connected, hence high efficiency, improved performance, innovation, and quality are our watch word.
OUR VISION
To be among the world's leading Engineering, construction, maintenance and procurement services companies. To be known as a company of international repute, providing quality and cost effective services to our clients, without cutting corners.

  • Customers and partners will see us as integral to their success. We will anticipate the needs and deliver on every commitment we make.
  • People will be proud to work at PSOVIC OVERFLOWS INT'L (NIG.) LTD. We will create opportunities to achieve the extraordinary, and we will reward success.
  • Communities will regard us as responsible and responsive. We will integrate global and local perspectives, promote sound management of resources, and contribute to a better quality of life. We will ensure environmental protection in every community we work in.
VALUES
  • Ethics:
    Uncompromising integrity, honesty, and fairness are at the heart of our operations.
  • Excellence:
    We set high standards. We apply advanced technology, and we continually innovate and improve. We thrive on challenge and accomplishment.
  • Fair Return:
    We eam a return that fairly rewards the value we deliver.
  • Mutual Respect:
    We work by our Leadership Covenants, which encourages openness, teamwork and trust. We value an inclusive culture based on diverse backgrounds, experience and views.
  • Safety:
    Zero accident is our unwavering goal it people's lives depend on it
  • Sustainability:
    We plan and act of the future for the long term good of our company, our customers, and our world.
  • Equal Opportunity:
    We pride ourselves in bring an equal opportunity employer. The only criteria for being part of our team is COMPETENCY. We don't regard Race, tribe, language or creed.
PSOVIC OVERFLOWS INT'L (NIG.) LTD. Capabilities have been applied extensively over the past years of operations with extremely successful results. Our services encompass feasibility studies, designing, construction, installation, maintenance works and procurement.
The company maintains a distinct group to cater for the Engineering needs of the company. These departments are responsible for plant services and engineering, Specialized Construction/Engineering Services and general construction and oilfield maintenance Our areas expertise includes but is not limited to:
  • Structural Design/Construction
  • Dredging
  • Road Construction
  • Building Construction
  • Land location platform Construction Works
  • Earthworks and Drainage
  • Foundation and Shore Protection Works/Jetty
  • Civil maintenance Works
  • Sourcing/Procurement Services etc.
